Package WordCounter

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
WordCounter.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable, CONSTANTS
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements CONSTANTS, javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the graphical user interface. Requires the JavaFX library to operate.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void cleanText()
    This method controls GUI functions by disabling the clean button, enabling the count button, sets the explanation label, and displays the cleaned/normalized text to the text area.
    void countWords()
    This method controls GUI functions by disabling the count button, enabling the begin button, sets the explanation label, and displays the list of word occurrences to the text area.

  • Method Details

    • displayToLabel

      public void displayToLabel​(java.lang.String name, int count)

    • downloadPage

      public void downloadPage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method controls GUI functions by disabling the begin button, enabling the clean button, sets the explanation label, and displays the downloaded text to the text area. It calls the method that handles the downloading of the page source.
      Parameters:
      event - This event is initiated by the begin button.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - A file not found exception is a critical application failure. The application cannot continue.

    • cleanText

      public void cleanText()
      This method controls GUI functions by disabling the clean button, enabling the count button, sets the explanation label, and displays the cleaned/normalized text to the text area. It calls the method that handles the text normalization.

    • countWords

      public void countWords() throws java.io.IOException
      This method controls GUI functions by disabling the count button, enabling the begin button, sets the explanation label, and displays the list of word occurrences to the text area. It calls the method that counts the word occurrences.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - A file not found exception is a critical application failure. The application cannot continue.
      java.io.IOException

    • displayText

      public static java.lang.String displayText​(java.lang.String directory) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This is a method that reads a text file and returns it as a string.
      Parameters:
      directory - This is the text file directory. Refer to CONSTANTS.java for specifications.
      Returns:
      It returns the text contained in the specified file directory.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - A file not found exception is a critical application failure. The application cannot continue.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This method provides baseline GUI settings. Disables the clean button and the count button, sets the explanation label, and disables editing of the text area.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve root object paths.
      resources - The resources that are used on the root object.
